brDecisionText.para:
Figure Caption style:
fill: white (#111111)
font: Calibri
fontSize: 10px
fontStyle: Regular
fontColor: black (#000000)

Warning/Caution Annunciator Caption style:
font: Calibri
fontSize: 12px
fontStyle: bold
fill: Red (#FF0000) | fontColor: black (#000000) / white (#FFFFFF)
fill: Yellow (#FF0000) | fontColor: black (#000000)
fill: Black (#000000) | green (#008000)/ red (#FF0000) / yellow (#FF0000) / white (#FFFFFF)
